MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: screen saver, screensaver, manager, management, organize, multiple, more, than, one, background, music, audio
English.Char_Desc_80: Run all of your favorite screensavers, organize them, and even add music.
English.Char_Desc_250: Do you have more than one favorite screensaver? All of usl do! This application lets you run all of your favorite screensavers, organize them by theme, give them ratings, and even add music! Download the free trial today.
English.Char_Desc_450: What's your favorite screensaver? If you're like most people, you don't have just one. This application lets you run all of your favorite screensavers by quickly and easily putting them into playlists, all without ever having to bother with the tedious Windows Control Panel! Organize screensavers by theme, give them ratings, and even add music! Download the free trial today.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
What's your favorite screensaver? Do you have a hard time picking just one? If so, you're not alone! With the literally thousands of screensavers that can be downloaded right now, most of us have several screensavers that we enjoy watching. Whether it's gently flowing waterfalls, morphing geometrics, or blasting enemy spaceships in the outer reaches of space, it can be hard to pick just one! And any user of Windows knows that it can be a real hassle to change your screensaver on a frequent basis.
And that's exactly why you need ProSaver Screensaver Manager, from WaveBreak Software! ProSaver is a full-featured screensaver management and enhancement application. ProSaver will make your life easier and more fun in many ways:
• Run all of your favorite screensavers without ever having to bother with the tedious Windows Control Panel.
• Quickly and easily create playlists from your available screensavers and set them to play back just the way you like using our concise 'Options' sheet.
• Newly downloaded screensavers can be added to the current playlist with a few clicks of the mouse, and "stale" screensavers deleted just as easily.
• Organize your screensavers by theme, and give them ratings (from 1 to 5 stars) so you can find the best ones quickly.
• Open the ProSaver playlist window or start your screensaver instantly with the touch of a button.
And, as an added feature, have you ever thought that a certain screensaver would be just perfect ... if only it had a certain song playing in the back- ground? With ProSaver Screensaver Manager, you can do exactly that! Add your favorite music to almost any screensaver, and turn a *good* screensaver into a *great* one!
Sometimes you just need to kick back and relax, and screensavers are a great way to do exactly that! You've earned a break, so download the free trial today!
